medical_history.chief_complaint: Multiple verruca-like nodules on the dorsal surface of hands and feet, multiple pitted keratoses on palms and soles, and papillomatosis of the oral cavity.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The lesions had been present for more than 30 years.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Resection for bilateral gynecomastia 10 years prior.
medical_history.family_history: Older brother died from colorectal adenocarcinoma; daughters presented with multiple skin-colored keratotic small papules and papillomatosis of the oral cavity.
